text: Kozhym () is an urban locality (an urban-type settlement) under the administrative jurisdiction of the town of republic significance of Inta in the Komi Republic, Russia. As of the 2010 Census, its population was 10. ==Administrative and municipal status== Within the framework of administrative divisions, the urban-type settlement of Kozhym, together with three rural localities, is incorporated as Kozhym Urban-Type Settlement Administrative Territory, which is subordinated to the town of republic significance of Inta.Law #13-RZ Within the framework of municipal divisions, Kozhym is a part of Inta Urban Okrug.Law #11-RZ ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Urban-type settlements in the Komi Republic __NOTOC__
title: Kozhym
